title: Chromas - Please make more for base skins
body:
Hey all, 

I just wanted to give a little feedback on the chromas currently available. While I like them and the ability to change my colors is great, it's rather a large hindrance that I can't actually use most of the chromas without owning a skin of some kind. I know this might not always be viable to do, but please riot, try to make chromas for more bases. That way if players like me can get colors for champs I play on occasion but don't necessarily play enough to warrant buying a skin for. 

Thank you for reading
Lucky{{champion:78}}
